name: MaterialScalarParameter
desc: The scalar parameter applied to a material.

items.name: init(floatLiteral: Float)
items.desc: Creates a scalar parameter from a floating-point literal.

items.name: init(integerLiteral: Int)
items.desc: Creates a scalar parameter from an integer literal.

items.name: typealias MaterialScalarParameter.FloatLiteralType
items.desc: A type for use in creating a scalar parameter from a floating-point literal.

items.name: typealias MaterialScalarParameter.IntegerLiteralType
items.desc: A type for use in creating a scalar parameter from an integer literal.

items.name: static func == (MaterialScalarParameter, MaterialScalarParameter) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two scalar parameters are equal.

items.name: static func != (MaterialScalarParameter, MaterialScalarParameter) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two scalar parameters are not equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the scalar parameter by feeding them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the scalar parameter.
